pages.text: Cambroraster is a genus of hurdiid radiodont describled in 2019. It was relatively large, up to 30 cm long and it had a horseshoe shaped dorsal carapace. It likely fed by sifting through the sediment with its oral cone and frontal appendages, with had hooked spines.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Bucket
